Sopheat Sor

Hi Sor,

I hope you are doing well.

Unfortunately, We cannot locate this order. Perhaps its from a different site? can you send us where this site is? "Your order from TARP WAREHOUSE SALES"

Hi Joel,




Hi Joel,
I hope you could help with this order please as this PayPal notification came in on the 30/06 on ref number:2286 and this order has still not dropped in Pronto and we cannot see what the customer was trying to order. The reference number seems to be belonged to Spidertarp but is different from the other Ref. numbers.



 Regards
Sopheat
